actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a special postage stamp in commemoration of the bicentennial anniversary of the Battle of Dorchester Heights.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Postmaster General to issue a special postage stamp commemorating the Battle of Dorchaster Heights. Directs that such stamp be first placed on sale at Boston, Massachusetts, on March 17, 1976.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a special postage stamp in commemoration of the bicentennial anniversary of the Battle of Dorchester Heights.
